sentences.cn: ...一个强壮的脸色红润的英国人。

sentences.en: He was handsome and unattractive , a swashbuckling , beefy, conceited man who was putting on fat.
sentences.cn: 他样子挺英俊,可就是不讨人喜欢;长得结实粗壮,身子已经开始发胖,这个人夜郎自大, 欺软怕硬.

sentences.en: He was tall, about Feliks'height, and beefy, easier to shoot than a small man.
sentences.cn: 他个子很高, 和费利克斯差不多, 身体肥胖,用枪打比瘦子好击中.

sentences.en: I suppose there is some matron with beefy forearms.
sentences.cn: 我想,那里现在大概有一位胳膊粗壮的女管家了吧.

sentences.en: If the air bags don't deploy it doesn't matter, because our cars are so beefy.
sentences.cn: 如果气囊打不开,那也不打紧, 因为我们的车肉头一样地耐撞.

sentences.en: Our beefy burger smothered with warm queso sauce, chili and cheddar jack cheese.
sentences.cn: 该牛肉汉堡上均匀覆盖着温热的克索酱, 辣椒和切达芝士条,美味诱人.

trans.tran_cn: 牛肉似的，结实的，肌肉发达的
trans.tran_en: someone who is beefy is big, strong, and often quite fat
